name: Dr. Noir
description:
Welcome to the Dr. Noir's hurry to survive!

Imagine that **you're a doctor** living in a **steampunk apocalyptic** world and a virus starts to spread across the planet.

And to make things even worse... you got infected as well!

Now you have a limited amount of time to find the right ingredients, make the cure and run into a bunker to survive the end of the world. Well, good luck.

How to Play?
  • You're infected! Your objective it to keep yourself alive and make the blue antidote to enter in the bunker.
  • Use WASD to walk. Find the capsules, grab them using E and drop on the corresponding antidote machine colors until you get the blue one.
  • Once you have the blue antidote, drop it in front of the bunker to enter and survive!
  • And remember: In the game, you'll have a new virus side effect every clock cycle that may affect your abbilities to survive!

So now that you know what is the problem and how to play, the only question that I need to ask is:

Will Dr. Noir survive?
